00013 #define DEFAULT_NAME    "gabor_1"
00014 #define DEFAULT_THETA   0.0f
00015 #define DEFAULT_SIGMA   9.0f
00016 #define DEFAULT_LAMBDA  25.0f
00017 #define DEFAULT_PSI     0.0f
00018 #define DEFAULT_HOST    "localhost"
00019 #define DEFAULT_PORT    20001
00020 #define DEFAULT_JOB             "defaultjob"
00021 #define DEFAULT_TYPE    "defaultype"
00022 #define DEFAULT_DIV_X   2
00023 #define DEFAULT_DIV_Y   2
00024 
00025 // All TAGs are used in XML parsing/writing
00026 
00027 // Filter config
00028 #define TAG_ROOT                        "ProgramConfiguration"
00029 #define TAG_GABOR                       "GaborFilter"
00030 #define TAG_NAME                        "Name"
00031 #define TAG_THETA                       "Theta"
00032 #define TAG_SIGMA                       "Sigma"
00033 #define TAG_LAMBDA                      "Lambda"
00034 #define TAG_PSI                         "Psi"
00035 
00036 // Network Config (filter specific)
00037 #define TAG_HOST                        "Host"
00038 #define TAG_PORT                        "Port"
00039 #define TAG_TYPE                        "Type"
00040 #define TAG_JOB                         "Job"
00041 
00042 // Image division (filter specific)
00043 #define TAG_DIV_X                       "Div_X"
00044 #define TAG_DIV_Y                       "Div_Y"
00045 
00046 // Global config
00047 #define TAG_GLOBAL                      "GlobalConfig"
00048 #define TAG_SEND_FREQ                   "SendFreqency"
00049 #define TAG_HEARTBEAT_FREQ              "HeartbeatFrequency"
00050 #define TAG_NCSTOOLS                    "NCSTools"
00051 #define TAG_SERVER_THROTTLE             "ServerThrottle"
00052 #define TAG_PORT_NCSTOOLS               "PortNCSTools"
00053 #define TAG_HOST_NCSTOOLS               "HostNCSTools"
00054 #define TAG_DIFF_IMAGES                 "DiffImages"

00061 struct GaborConfig
00062 {
00063         // Filter parameters
00064         string name;
00065         float theta;
00066         float sigma;
00067         float lambda;
00068         float psi;
00069         // Network config
00070         string host;
00071         int port;
00072         string type;
00073         string job;
00074         // Image division
00075         int div_x;
00076         int div_y;
00077 };
00078 
00085 class CompleteConfig
00086 {
00087 
00088 public:
00089 
00093         CompleteConfig()
00094         {
00095                 send_freq = 100.0;      
00096                 b_ncstools = false;
00097                 b_server_throttle = false;
00098                 host_ncstools = string("localhost");
00099                 port_ncstools = 20001;
00100                 heartbeat_freq = 10.0;
00101                 b_valid = false;
00102                 b_diff_images = true;
00103         }
00104 
00108         ~CompleteConfig() {}
00109 
00114         void validate(string &error)
00115         {
00116                 b_valid = false;
00117                 // Make sure all names are unique and valid
00118                 map<string, int> str_map;
00119                 for(int i=0; i<filters.size(); ++i)
00120                 {
00121                         if( 0 != str_map[ filters[i].name ] )
00122                         {
00123                                 // Name was already added to map        
00124                                 error = string( "duplicate name " );
00125                                 error.append( filters[i].name );
00126                                 return;
00127                         }
00128                         if( string( "" ) == filters[i].name )
00129                         {
00130                                 // Invalid name
00131                                 error = string( "invalid name value in GaborFilter" );
00132                                 return;
00133                         }
00134                         str_map[ filters[i].name ] = 1;
00135                 }
00136                 // Make sure values are valid for all filter parameters
00137                 for(int i=0; i<filters.size(); ++i)
00138                 {
00139                         if( filters[i].theta < 0.0 ||
00140                                 filters[i].sigma < 0.0 ||
00141                                 filters[i].lambda < 0.0 ||
00142                                 filters[i].psi < 0.0 )
00143                         {
00144                                 error = string( "invalid configuration value in GaborFilter" );
00145                                 return;
00146                         }
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 // TODO: validate network configuration for each filter
00150                 // TODO: validate global configuration
00151 
00152                 b_valid = true;
00153         }
00154 
00159         bool isValid()
00160         { return b_valid; }
00161 
00165         void clear()
00166         {
00167                 filters.clear();
00168                 send_freq = 100.0;      
00169                 b_ncstools = false;
00170                 b_server_throttle = false;
00171                 host_ncstools = string("localhost");
00172                 port_ncstools = 20001;
00173                 heartbeat_freq = 10.0;
00174                 b_valid = false;
00175         }
00176 
00180         GaborConfig getDefaultGaborConfig()
00181         {
00182                 GaborConfig conf;
00183                 // Filter parameters
00184                 conf.name = DEFAULT_NAME;
00185                 conf.theta = DEFAULT_THETA;
00186                 conf.sigma = DEFAULT_SIGMA;  
00187                 conf.lambda = DEFAULT_LAMBDA;
00188                 conf.psi = DEFAULT_PSI;         
00189                 // Network config
00190                 conf.host = DEFAULT_HOST;
00191                 conf.port = DEFAULT_PORT;
00192                 conf.job = DEFAULT_JOB;
00193                 conf.type = DEFAULT_TYPE;
00194                 conf.div_x = DEFAULT_DIV_X;
00195                 conf.div_y = DEFAULT_DIV_Y;
00196                 return conf;    
00197         }
00198 
00199         float send_freq; // Frequency (ms) of send
00200         vector<GaborConfig> filters; // List of filter objects
00201         float heartbeat_freq; // Frequency of heartbeat
00202         bool b_ncstools; // NCS Tools flag
00203         bool b_server_throttle; // Server throttle flag
00204         int port_ncstools; // NCS Tools port (network communication)
00205         string host_ncstools; // NCS Tools host (network communication)
00206         bool b_diff_images; // Difference images flag
00207 
00208 private:
00209 
00210         bool b_valid; // Validity status of configuration
00211 
00212 };
